title: Help? Client won't open.

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body: I tried to open my client and then this. (see link)

replies.body: I must admit that this is a first for me. However, can you right click your League of Legends application and run it in compatibility mode? If that doesn't work, please try reinstalling League of Legends and seeing if that resolves your issues. Keep me updated!
Reinstalled and seems to be patching just fine.

> [{quoted}](name=TeamHydra,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=MEvwYNs6,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-08-15T11:24:13.072+0000)
>
> Reinstalled and seems to be patching just fine.

Good to hear! :D
